title: Who is better, Trundle or IRELIA???
body: I personally think irelia is better

replies.body: Depends on team comp. Trundle has better peel , zone control and is slightly better than Irelia in fighting tanks. Irelia has better mobility, burst and has ranged ultimate.
Irelia in my opinion is much better, but she gets banned very often sooo
Depends. I think if trundle has ult then he wins else inside that cd irelia does...
